title: Rebel Bingo
desc: Important customer terms and conditions for our tickets: Ticket holders must bring a printed ticket with them on the night. In purchasing these tickets you understand that Rebel Bingo is not a gambling event and is not like the game traditionally known as "bingo". It is a live stage show designed purely for the purposes of entertainment. Any games we play at the events are not fair and the numbers called do not determine whether you win a prize. In purchasing a ticket you are not paying for the chance to win a prize, you are paying to be entertained. If you want to gamble, try Vegas or Atlantic City. Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable. Tickets only guarantee entry up to 45 minutes after doors open. We reserve the right to refuse entry. At points guests are permitted to get on?stage and participate in the show. You get on stage and participate at your own risk and should not do so if you are under the influence of alcohol. All male groups will not be admitted. Dress code:  o obvious bachelor or bachelorette party attire. No glow sticks stuff. - This is strictly a 21+ event - No refunds will be offered unless event is canceled. - Coat check is availible and mandatory in cold weather. - The event ends at 10pm.
